messages.content: Dear Voter, Do you want a fresh option for Islington North, to put belief back into your heart and hope back home... Is it time for Greg in Islington North?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £3 billion into the NHS, and stop
from getting free operations paid by the UK taxpayer.
Spend far less money on foreign aid.
Reduce the cost of living by scrapping the 5% VAT on household energy bills.
Raise education standards for all and ensure there are effective apprenticeships available.
Control immigration and strengthen border security.
Make the tax system fairer for all.

issues.economy: Reduce the cost of living by scrapping the 5% VAT on household energy bills.
issues.education: Raise education standards for all and ensure there are effective apprenticeships available.
issues.health: Invest £3 billion into the NHS, and stop
from getting free operations paid by the UK taxpayer.
issues.immigration: Control immigration and strengthen border security.

images.caption: GREG CLOUGH Standing Up for Real Change
How we can change the future together
